Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Sedgwick. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Sedgwick.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
